snippet: Thanks to a repave that led to blistering speeds, Pocono Raceway’s track record was topped 36 times. Joey Logano had the fastest speed of them all.
lead_paragraph: Thanks to a repave that led to blistering speeds, Pocono Raceway’s track record was topped 36 times. Joey Logano had the fastest speed of them all.

headline.seo: Nascar — Logano Sets Track Record at Pocono Raceway
headline.main: Logano Sets Track Record at Pocono Raceway
